context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: explore various options such as speaking to the doctor about any possible alternatives or generics that might be cheaper
approach charitable organizations or foundations that assist with medical costs

contact the pharmaceutical company and ask if they have any assistance programs available
explore all possible financial paths available
explore all options available to him
explore various options such as negotiating with the hospital or the drug company for a payment plan, reduced cost or free trials
research alternative methods of obtaining the medication

reach out to various organizations that assist with medical expenses, research on potential discounts or assistance programs from pharmaceutical companies, explore crowdfunding options or consider applying for medical loans
exhaust all possible options

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call for a cab or a ride-sharing service like Uber or Lyft to take him to the airport

call for roadside assistance or a tow truck

call a taxi or a ride-sharing service such as Uber or Lyft

call for roadside assistance or a tow truck service immediately
call a taxi, Uber, or any other transport service that can get him to the airport quickly
call a taxi or ride-sharing service like Uber or Lyft in order to quickly get to the airport while the car is being repaired or towed
call for roadside assistance or a taxi service to help him get to the airport in time

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: carefully recount the money in the register to make sure that no mistake was made
contact his supervisor or the owner of the bakery to inform them about the missing money
report the missing money to his supervisor or the owner of the bakery immediately
report the missing money to his supervisor or owner immediately
immediately report the missing money to the bakery's owner or to his supervisor
investigate the source of the discrepancy
inform his supervisor about the missing money and review surveillance footage or check recent transactions to try to identify any mishaps
check the security footage to see if there were any mistakes or thefts during his shift
double check all the sales receipts and compare them with the cash in the register
contact his supervisor or the owner to inform them of the situation

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.

generation: stay calm and think clearly
stay in one place to increase their chances of being found
